1.title: Rivka/Melissa

episode of.title: Starving Secrets with Tracey Gold (TV Series 2011– )

1.plot: Melissa's ED has left her far from her family, alone and destitute. But when she threatens to leave treatment, Tracey makes a last ditch effort to get her back on track. Though her life has been crippled by anorexia, Rivka refuses to stop over-exercising while in treatment. With her continuing weight loss threatening her life, Tracey offers one final hope - intense in-patient treatment in Oregon.

2.title: Suzanne/Lisa

episode of.title: Starving Secrets with Tracey Gold (TV Series 2011– )

2.plot: After getting sober a year ago, Suzanne's weight has ballooned, despite her intense bulimia. She's 24 days away from going to jail for a theft she committed to support her ED. Tracey wants to help her find a job, so she can enter work furlough, and continue her treatment.

3.title: Marlita

episode of.title: Starving Secrets with Tracey Gold (TV Series 2011– )

3.plot: Marlita's family is helpless and terrified by her life -threatening downward spiral into bulimia and drug addiction. Tracey's efforts to get her into treatment are thwarted when she refuses to go along with the food program she's been prescribed.

4.title: Lauren Michelle

episode of.title: Starving Secrets with Tracey Gold (TV Series 2011– )

4.plot: Over the last decade, Lauren's bulimia has taken her life downhill. With a new boyfriend considering marriage, Tracey's sudden offer of treatment presents her an unexpected new hope. Michelle's marriage is on the rocks and her husband Matt's despair over her eating disorders has become unbearable. Despite Michelle's denial, Tracey wants her in treatment for both her bulimia and her drinking.

5.title: Leanora

episode of.title: Starving Secrets with Tracey Gold (TV Series 2011– )

5.plot: 19-year-old Bailey doesn't really believe she needs to give up her anorexia, or her drinking, despite her parents' desperate pleas to Tracey. Nevertheless, she agrees to begin treatment, in the hope of saving her new marriage. After 27 years of anorexia, and many failed treatments, Annalisa is willing to try one last time when Tracey offers her one last opportunity.

6.title: Bailey Annalisa

episode of.title: Starving Secrets with Tracey Gold (TV Series 2011– )

-1.title: Breaking the Chain

episode of.title: Starving Secrets with Tracey Gold (TV Series 2011– )

-1.plot: Over the last 18 months, Leonora has lost more than 200 pounds by starving herself and abusing prescription medications. Despite her potentially fatal condition, Tracey's efforts to bring her to California for treatment are endangered by her reluctance to first enter into detox for the medications.

imdb.title: Starving Secrets with Tracey Gold
akas: Starving Secrets with Tracey Gold (United States)
plot: Take 10 girls that are suffering from eating disorders and put them in treatment centers and document their journeys throughout their process.::Anonymous
